lead_paragraph: If major league stars want reclining chairs, wraparound leather couches and big-screen televisions in their vehicles, they know where to go.

byline.contributor: Angel Valentin contributed reporting, and Doris Burke contributed research.

headline.main: Where the Stars Get Their Rides

snippet: If major league stars want reclining chairs, wraparound leather couches and big-screen televisions in their vehicles, they know where to go.
abstract: Auto Firm customizing garage in Doral, Fla, is go-to business for many Major League Baseball players looking to upgrade and personalize their luxury cars; one of Vega’s fastest-selling vehicles is custom Mercedes limousine van that features bar, two reclining chairs, wraparound leather couch, two big-screen televisions and home theater system.
